methods.name: a
javadoc: Sends two ints to the client-side Container. Used for furnace burning time, smelting progress, brewing progress, and enchanting level. Normally the first int identifies which variable to update, and the second contains the new value. Both are truncated to shorts in non-local SMP.

methods.name: a
javadoc: Sends the contents of an inventory slot to the client-side Container. This doesn't have to match the actual contents of that slot.

methods.name: a
javadoc: update the crafting window inventory with the items in the list
